item.title: remarkable is being tried out as a markdown editor
item.description: Remarkable Experimenting with this yay installed app, and a dropbox folder called Journal. Start with local Documents/Journal and create files with format yyyy-mm-dd-hhmm.md and then upload. Or with the yay dropbox app installed in the computer, the files can be edited in situ, as the dropbox folders are replicated. website remarkable
